BusinessName: ANDIAMO'S O'HARE, LLC (ANDIAMO'S O'HARE (HILTON O'HARE LOBBY))
Name: SANITIZING RINSE FOR EQUIPMENT AND UTENSILS:  CLEAN, PROPER TEMPERATURE, CONCENTRATION, EXPOSURE TIME
Comments: Equipment and utensils should get proper exposure to the sanitizing solution during the rinse cycle.  Bactericidal treatment shall consist of exposure of all dish and utensil surfaces to a rinse of clean water at a temperature of not less than 180F.    FOUND HIGH TEMPERATURE DISHMACHNE (POT WASHER) NOT MAINTAINING PROPER FINAL RINSE TEMPERATURE OF 180F. NOTED FINAL RINSE TEMPERATURE OF 115F. INSTRUCTED MANAGER, A MECHANICAL DISH WASHING MACHINE SHOULD PROVIDE A FINAL SANITIZING OF EITHER 50 PPM CHLORINE FOR CHEMICAL SANITIZING MACHINE OR 180F OR ABOVE FOR FINAL RINSE FOR HOT WATER SANITIZING MACHINE. THE SAID DISH MACHINE WAS TAGGED 'HELD FOR INSPECTION' BY THE CHICAGO DEPT. OF PUBLIC HEALTH. INSTRUCTED NOT TO USE. (TEMPORARILY USE 3 COMPARTMENT SINK AND HIGH TEMPERATURE DISHMACHINE) INSTRUCTED TO REPAIR. WHEN FIXED, PLEASE FAX A REQUEST FOR RE INSPECTION AT 312-746-4240 TO ENSURE THAT THE SAID EQUIPMENT IS REPAIRED AND HELD FOR INSPECTION TAG CAN BE REMOVED PRIOR TO USE.  CRITICAL CITATION ISSUED 7-38-030
